nodes.text: Harrod was a star in the Oplovis sector, within the New Territories portion of the Outer Rim Territories. Its system contained a single habitable world, known simply as Harrod's Planet.

The star Harrod was mentioned in the 2008 The Complete Star Wars Encyclopedia. Its creation was based on Harrod's Planet, which originated in the 1990 The Rebel Alliance Sourcebook, written by Paul Murphy as a supplement for West End Games' Star Wars: The Roleplaying Game.
The 2009 reference book The Essential Atlas placed the Harrod's Planet system, and therefore Harrod itself, in grid square M-5.
